||TILL THE END OF TIME||

summary: 25 Days Of Christmas:  Day One: All I want for Christmas is to get away from you. none of these gifs will have relevance to the...
caption:
25 Days Of Christmas: 

Day One: All I want for Christmas is to get away from you.

none of these gifs will have relevance to the story they’re just Christmas.

ENJOY!!!!!

Angst - Words 2k

.-.-.-.

When you agreed to come to Anne’s Christmas dinner tonight this was the opposite of what you thought would happen. She had only sent you a message a few days ago asking if you would like to come and despite everything that had gone down between you and Harry in the last few months you couldn’t bring yourself to say no to her.

Now you were stuck in her house because of the massive snow fall, cold after the power went out with your ex eyeing you from the opposite couch. Just great.

Anne, Gemma, Michel, Louise and Chloe were all playing ‘cards against humanity’, you and Harry were supposed to be playing as well but you had lost the mood to play. All you could feel was the burn of Harry’s eyes on your side. Neither of you had bothered to place any of your cards down since the first round and the others hadn’t bothered to get you to play.

“Okay, last round. Think we all need to go to bed and warm up.” Anne said through a laugh at the last card combination.

The fire was crackling quietly in the mostly dark room and when Anne turned to look at you sat next to her, she frowned slightly. She didn’t know the specifics of what happened between you and Harry but she didn’t realise how bad it was until the two of you were in a room together. The two of you were colder to each other than the snow outside. Despite you and Harry being broken up you still got along with Anne and Gemma so she thought you would have fun if she invited you but she was very wrong and she regretted it.

“I think I’m already pooped mum,” Gemma yawned, looking up at Michel. “We’ll go up to bed now, good night.”

“Good night sweetheart.” Anne smiled at the two as they hurried up the stairs before turning and looking at the rest of us. “We’ll have to figure out beds. Gem and Michel are going to be in her room. Harry’s in his room, Louise and Chloe can share my bed, YN you can have the spare room and I’ll take the couch.”

“Anne, no, this is your house. I’m fine on the couch, you have the bed.” You interrupted her as she started to organise the pillows on the couch.

“Sweetheart, I feel bad, I invited you and this is what happened.”

“Seriously Anne, it’s fine.” Reaching out a hand you rested it over arm to stop her from fussing with the pillows and she smiled softly at you before leaning over and giving you a hug.

“I’ll get you some blankets.”

“Don’t worry about it mum, I can grab them.” Harry said flatly and you finally moved your eyes to meet his.

You stared at each other for a few minutes before Louise said something and you were snapped away from the deep swirling green of his eyes.

“Chloe can have the spare room. You and I can have a mini sleep over.” You chuckled a little as the two of them laughed all the way up the stairs, Chloe following behind them with a confused look on her face.

“I’ll get you some blankets,” Harry said when it was just the two of you alone downstairs.

You nodded at him because you weren’t sure what could come out of your mouth if you looked at him. You wanted to cuss him out. An argument was the end point of your relationship and you still felt as if you hadn’t said everything that you wanted to.

“Or,” he stopped right in front of you, looking down at you so softly you thought he might crumble. “There is room in my bed.”

Shaking your head, you looked away from him because you didn’t want him to see the tears that were beginning to stain your eyes. “Harry,” you started.

“Come on, there’s a lot of windows and doors down here, the cold comes in. It will be so much warmer in my room.” He sat down next to you on the couch and instinctively you moved away from him.

He was just trying to be nice, he was Harry and was as polite as a saint but it felt like he wanted to do a lot more than just make sure you were warm for the night.

“Just sleep.” You whispered, not daring to make eye contact.

“Just sleep.” He repeated.

Sighing you pushed up from the lounge and started towards the stairs but Harry grabbed you around the wrist to stop you. “Just sleep Harry,” You said sternly and instantly he dropped his hand from around yours.

Breathing in deeply you made your way to his bedroom, you had only been to his mum’s house a few times but you knew your way to his old bedroom in the dark as easily if you were in your own house. You heard the quiet click of the door close behind you but you didn’t turn to look at him.

“Don’t look,” you said as you started to pull your shirt over your head.

Harry chuckled and you heard the rustle of clothes as he started to pull his own clothes off. “It’s dark, YN.” He said before quietly adding, “Seen you naked before as well.”

“That’s it I’m going back downstairs.” Grabbing your shirt, you went towards the door but he stepped in front of you, blocking you from leaving.

Your eyes looked down his chest, skimming over the dark lines of his tattoos. Even in the soft blue light of the moon coming in through the window they were still so prominent against the muscled skin of his chest. His eyes did the same, glancing down to look at your chest as well, the lacy material of your bra doing little to cover you.

“Look I’m sorry. I’m not used to this.” His eyes bore down into yours and out of the corner of your eye you watched his hand reach out to run over your hip but very quickly decided against it.

“I don’t think you understand how much I really don’t want to be here right now.” Your voice cracked a little as you created a little distance between the two of you.

“I fucked up,” He started loudly but quietened down to a whisper yell upon realising everyone else was trying to sleep. “I fucked up. I never thought it would hurt you, I told you I wasn’t ready for a relationship.”

“What the fuck is wrong with you? You’re going to blame me after all this shit. You told me you loved me, that you wanted to be with me. You were the one that got freaked out and disappeared for a week telling me you didn’t want a relationship, then you came crawling back with no apology and repeated it all over again.”

“I’m sorry,” he said again, staring at his bare feet.

“Sorry,” You whispered, a fat tear rolling down your cheek. “I love you Harry, but that hurt and saying sorry isn’t going to fix it. Do you even mean it? Because it just sounds like you keep saying it so I forgive you and we can cuddle tonight.”

Harry nodded and took a step forward hands reaching up again but you hurriedly pushed his hands away. Shaking his head, he started walking to the bed and you stepped back as well to avoid meeting him but then your knees hit the back of the bed and you fell backwards onto it.

“Don’t Harry,” You pointed a finger at him as he started to climb on the bed.

Shaking his head again, he moved up beside you before lying down, his body a good distance away from yours as he rid himself of his pants climbing under the sheets. Standing up you looked down to see him staring up at the ceiling. He was quiet and complacent, chest rising and falling steadily. It was the opposite of the Harry you saw only seconds ago.

Slowly you tugged your jeans down, keeping an eye on him to check he wasn’t going to look over at you. But he kept still, eyes locked to the ceiling. “You can have my shirt.” He said, voice flat.

Turning away from him you pulled your bra off and put your own shirt back on. This was one of the reasons you were so annoyed with him. One moment he’s talking to you and telling you he fucked up then he’s silent and brooding. It was like talking to a brick wall when he was like this.

It made it hard to love him when he shut himself off emotionally. When he was open with you, you had never felt warmer or cosier inside, his hugs felt like a home away from home and when he kissed you, he kissed you like his life depended on it and if he only a had a few breathes left to spare he would use them kissing you.  

But when he was closed off it was horrible. You were alone, cold and left wondering if you had done something wrong. He left and every time he did and it felt as if he had taken a bit of your heart with him.

Climbing into the bed you kept as close to the edge as possible, swaddling yourself up into the thick blankets to warm yourself up. You had almost forgotten about the snow until that moment, even threw the heavy blankets you could still feel the cold bite of it.

“I really am sorry, not just because I want to cuddle you.” He kept his eyes on the ceiling even as you turned over to look at him. “You know the phrase, you never know how much you love something till you lose it? Never felt so real until you walked out.”

You didn’t reply to him. This was something that could wait till morning.  

The weight of the bed dipped down as Harry moved closer to you and because you were already so close to the edge you couldn’t get away from him. Tears stung your eyes, the adrenaline that kept you strong before was gone and you felt vulnerable with him being so close.

“I do love you.” He started, hand caressing over the small of your back.

“Just sleep Harry,” You whispered, fighting off tears.

“I love you so much YN and I’m sorry for hurting you and I do want to be with you so bad but I can’t be that serious.”

“How is being your girlfriend that serious Harry?” Turning over you pressed a hand to his chest, stopping him from getting closer. “We were dating, your mum called me your girlfriend and you didn’t flinch so why do you have a problem with saying it? I just want you to say we’re together.”

Harry exhaled heavily, a hand coming up to circle around your wrist. His touch was warm, contrasting the chill of the room. “I freaked out. Every other relationship turned to shit when it became official and I didn’t want to lose you, so everyone time I felt I was in to deep I had to leave and you were always there when I wanted to come back.”

“And how did you think that would make me feel Harry?”

“I didn’t. I was thinking about myself. I can be with you, I want to be and we can be official. I promise no matter what I will come back to you, even if I get overwhelmed with it, I will come back to you because I love you and I want to be with you.” His voice was rough, cracking even and you chocked on a breath as he lifted your hand up and pressed a soft kiss to the inside of your wrist.

“Promise.”

Raising your pinkie finger, you kept it in front of his eyes. He didn’t hesitate, as he reached out and locked his pinkie finger around yours.

“Promise.” He smiled softly, squeezing your finger. “Can we cuddle now.”

Humming you pulled your finger back from his, hand pressing to his chest to make him give you more room on the mattress. “You’ve got a lot more making up to do before you get any cuddles.”

Harry smiled and moved back but still tugged you so you weren’t one small roll from ending up on the floor in the middle of the night. You weren’t going to give him cuddles, well not voluntarily, it was Harry and you knew he would find some way of getting you in his arms in the middle of the night, for now though you settled for threading your fingers with his. A little love is better than none.

none of these gifs will have relevance to the story they’re just Christmas.

Climbing into the bed you kept as close to the edge as possible, swaddling yourself up into the thick blankets to warm yourself up. You had almost forgotten about the snow until that moment, even threw the heavy blankets you could still feel the cold bite of it.

“I really am sorry, not just because I want to cuddle you.” He kept his eyes on the ceiling even as you turned over to look at him. “You know the phrase, you never know how much you love something till you lose it? Never felt so real until you walked out.”

You didn’t reply to him. This was something that could wait till morning.  

The weight of the bed dipped down as Harry moved closer to you and because you were already so close to the edge you couldn’t get away from him. Tears stung your eyes, the adrenaline that kept you strong before was gone and you felt vulnerable with him being so close.

“I do love you.” He started, hand caressing over the small of your back.

“Just sleep Harry,” You whispered, fighting off tears.

“I love you so much YN and I’m sorry for hurting you and I do want to be with you so bad but I can’t be that serious.”

“How is being your girlfriend that serious Harry?” Turning over you pressed a hand to his chest, stopping him from getting closer. “We were dating, your mum called me your girlfriend and you didn’t flinch so why do you have a problem with saying it? I just want you to say we’re together.”

Harry exhaled heavily, a hand coming up to circle around your wrist. His touch was warm, contrasting the chill of the room. “I freaked out. Every other relationship turned to shit when it became official and I didn’t want to lose you, so everyone time I felt I was in to deep I had to leave and you were always there when I wanted to come back.”

“And how did you think that would make me feel Harry?”

“I didn’t. I was thinking about myself. I can be with you, I want to be and we can be official. I promise no matter what I will come back to you, even if I get overwhelmed with it, I will come back to you because I love you and I want to be with you.” His voice was rough, cracking even and you chocked on a breath as he lifted your hand up and pressed a soft kiss to the inside of your wrist.

“Promise.”

Raising your pinkie finger, you kept it in front of his eyes. He didn’t hesitate, as he reached out and locked his pinkie finger around yours.

“Promise.” He smiled softly, squeezing your finger. “Can we cuddle now.”

Humming you pulled your finger back from his, hand pressing to his chest to make him give you more room on the mattress. “You’ve got a lot more making up to do before you get any cuddles.”

Harry smiled and moved back but still tugged you so you weren’t one small roll from ending up on the floor in the middle of the night. You weren’t going to give him cuddles, well not voluntarily, it was Harry and you knew he would find some way of getting you in his arms in the middle of the night, for now though you settled for threading your fingers with his. A little love is better than none.
trail.content:
25 Days Of Christmas: 

Day One: All I want for Christmas is to get away from you.

none of these gifs will have relevance to the story they’re just Christmas.

ENJOY!!!!!

Angst - Words 2k

.-.-.-.

When you agreed to come to Anne’s Christmas dinner tonight this was the opposite of what you thought would happen. She had only sent you a message a few days ago asking if you would like to come and despite everything that had gone down between you and Harry in the last few months you couldn’t bring yourself to say no to her.

Now you were stuck in her house because of the massive snow fall, cold after the power went out with your ex eyeing you from the opposite couch. Just great.

Anne, Gemma, Michel, Louise and Chloe were all playing ‘cards against humanity’, you and Harry were supposed to be playing as well but you had lost the mood to play. All you could feel was the burn of Harry’s eyes on your side. Neither of you had bothered to place any of your cards down since the first round and the others hadn’t bothered to get you to play.

“Okay, last round. Think we all need to go to bed and warm up.” Anne said through a laugh at the last card combination.

The fire was crackling quietly in the mostly dark room and when Anne turned to look at you sat next to her, she frowned slightly. She didn’t know the specifics of what happened between you and Harry but she didn’t realise how bad it was until the two of you were in a room together. The two of you were colder to each other than the snow outside. Despite you and Harry being broken up you still got along with Anne and Gemma so she thought you would have fun if she invited you but she was very wrong and she regretted it.

“I think I’m already pooped mum,” Gemma yawned, looking up at Michel. “We’ll go up to bed now, good night.”

“Good night sweetheart.” Anne smiled at the two as they hurried up the stairs before turning and looking at the rest of us. “We’ll have to figure out beds. Gem and Michel are going to be in her room. Harry’s in his room, Louise and Chloe can share my bed, YN you can have the spare room and I’ll take the couch.”

“Anne, no, this is your house. I’m fine on the couch, you have the bed.” You interrupted her as she started to organise the pillows on the couch.

“Sweetheart, I feel bad, I invited you and this is what happened.”

“Seriously Anne, it’s fine.” Reaching out a hand you rested it over arm to stop her from fussing with the pillows and she smiled softly at you before leaning over and giving you a hug.

“I’ll get you some blankets.”

“Don’t worry about it mum, I can grab them.” Harry said flatly and you finally moved your eyes to meet his.

You stared at each other for a few minutes before Louise said something and you were snapped away from the deep swirling green of his eyes.

“Chloe can have the spare room. You and I can have a mini sleep over.” You chuckled a little as the two of them laughed all the way up the stairs, Chloe following behind them with a confused look on her face.

“I’ll get you some blankets,” Harry said when it was just the two of you alone downstairs.

You nodded at him because you weren’t sure what could come out of your mouth if you looked at him. You wanted to cuss him out. An argument was the end point of your relationship and you still felt as if you hadn’t said everything that you wanted to.

“Or,” he stopped right in front of you, looking down at you so softly you thought he might crumble. “There is room in my bed.”

Shaking your head, you looked away from him because you didn’t want him to see the tears that were beginning to stain your eyes. “Harry,” you started.

“Come on, there’s a lot of windows and doors down here, the cold comes in. It will be so much warmer in my room.” He sat down next to you on the couch and instinctively you moved away from him.

He was just trying to be nice, he was Harry and was as polite as a saint but it felt like he wanted to do a lot more than just make sure you were warm for the night.

“Just sleep.” You whispered, not daring to make eye contact.

“Just sleep.” He repeated.

Sighing you pushed up from the lounge and started towards the stairs but Harry grabbed you around the wrist to stop you. “Just sleep Harry,” You said sternly and instantly he dropped his hand from around yours.

Breathing in deeply you made your way to his bedroom, you had only been to his mum’s house a few times but you knew your way to his old bedroom in the dark as easily if you were in your own house. You heard the quiet click of the door close behind you but you didn’t turn to look at him.

“Don’t look,” you said as you started to pull your shirt over your head.

Harry chuckled and you heard the rustle of clothes as he started to pull his own clothes off. “It’s dark, YN.” He said before quietly adding, “Seen you naked before as well.”

“That’s it I’m going back downstairs.” Grabbing your shirt, you went towards the door but he stepped in front of you, blocking you from leaving.

Your eyes looked down his chest, skimming over the dark lines of his tattoos. Even in the soft blue light of the moon coming in through the window they were still so prominent against the muscled skin of his chest. His eyes did the same, glancing down to look at your chest as well, the lacy material of your bra doing little to cover you.

“Look I’m sorry. I’m not used to this.” His eyes bore down into yours and out of the corner of your eye you watched his hand reach out to run over your hip but very quickly decided against it.

“I don’t think you understand how much I really don’t want to be here right now.” Your voice cracked a little as you created a little distance between the two of you.

“I fucked up,” He started loudly but quietened down to a whisper yell upon realising everyone else was trying to sleep. “I fucked up. I never thought it would hurt you, I told you I wasn’t ready for a relationship.”

“What the fuck is wrong with you? You’re going to blame me after all this shit. You told me you loved me, that you wanted to be with me. You were the one that got freaked out and disappeared for a week telling me you didn’t want a relationship, then you came crawling back with no apology and repeated it all over again.”

“I’m sorry,” he said again, staring at his bare feet.

“Sorry,” You whispered, a fat tear rolling down your cheek. “I love you Harry, but that hurt and saying sorry isn’t going to fix it. Do you even mean it? Because it just sounds like you keep saying it so I forgive you and we can cuddle tonight.”

Harry nodded and took a step forward hands reaching up again but you hurriedly pushed his hands away. Shaking his head, he started walking to the bed and you stepped back as well to avoid meeting him but then your knees hit the back of the bed and you fell backwards onto it.

“Don’t Harry,” You pointed a finger at him as he started to climb on the bed.

Shaking his head again, he moved up beside you before lying down, his body a good distance away from yours as he rid himself of his pants climbing under the sheets. Standing up you looked down to see him staring up at the ceiling. He was quiet and complacent, chest rising and falling steadily. It was the opposite of the Harry you saw only seconds ago.

Slowly you tugged your jeans down, keeping an eye on him to check he wasn’t going to look over at you. But he kept still, eyes locked to the ceiling. “You can have my shirt.” He said, voice flat.

Turning away from him you pulled your bra off and put your own shirt back on. This was one of the reasons you were so annoyed with him. One moment he’s talking to you and telling you he fucked up then he’s silent and brooding. It was like talking to a brick wall when he was like this.

It made it hard to love him when he shut himself off emotionally. When he was open with you, you had never felt warmer or cosier inside, his hugs felt like a home away from home and when he kissed you, he kissed you like his life depended on it and if he only a had a few breathes left to spare he would use them kissing you.  

But when he was closed off it was horrible. You were alone, cold and left wondering if you had done something wrong. He left and every time he did and it felt as if he had taken a bit of your heart with him.

Climbing into the bed you kept as close to the edge as possible, swaddling yourself up into the thick blankets to warm yourself up. You had almost forgotten about the snow until that moment, even threw the heavy blankets you could still feel the cold bite of it.

“I really am sorry, not just because I want to cuddle you.” He kept his eyes on the ceiling even as you turned over to look at him. “You know the phrase, you never know how much you love something till you lose it? Never felt so real until you walked out.”

You didn’t reply to him. This was something that could wait till morning.  

The weight of the bed dipped down as Harry moved closer to you and because you were already so close to the edge you couldn’t get away from him. Tears stung your eyes, the adrenaline that kept you strong before was gone and you felt vulnerable with him being so close.

“I do love you.” He started, hand caressing over the small of your back.

“Just sleep Harry,” You whispered, fighting off tears.

“I love you so much YN and I’m sorry for hurting you and I do want to be with you so bad but I can’t be that serious.”

“How is being your girlfriend that serious Harry?” Turning over you pressed a hand to his chest, stopping him from getting closer. “We were dating, your mum called me your girlfriend and you didn’t flinch so why do you have a problem with saying it? I just want you to say we’re together.”

Harry exhaled heavily, a hand coming up to circle around your wrist. His touch was warm, contrasting the chill of the room. “I freaked out. Every other relationship turned to shit when it became official and I didn’t want to lose you, so everyone time I felt I was in to deep I had to leave and you were always there when I wanted to come back.”

“And how did you think that would make me feel Harry?”

“I didn’t. I was thinking about myself. I can be with you, I want to be and we can be official. I promise no matter what I will come back to you, even if I get overwhelmed with it, I will come back to you because I love you and I want to be with you.” His voice was rough, cracking even and you chocked on a breath as he lifted your hand up and pressed a soft kiss to the inside of your wrist.

“Promise.”

Raising your pinkie finger, you kept it in front of his eyes. He didn’t hesitate, as he reached out and locked his pinkie finger around yours.

“Promise.” He smiled softly, squeezing your finger. “Can we cuddle now.”

Humming you pulled your finger back from his, hand pressing to his chest to make him give you more room on the mattress. “You’ve got a lot more making up to do before you get any cuddles.”

Harry smiled and moved back but still tugged you so you weren’t one small roll from ending up on the floor in the middle of the night. You weren’t going to give him cuddles, well not voluntarily, it was Harry and you knew he would find some way of getting you in his arms in the middle of the night, for now though you settled for threading your fingers with his. A little love is better than none.

Now you were stuck in her house because of the massive snow fall, cold after the power went out with your ex eyeing you from the opposite couch. Just great.

Anne, Gemma, Michel, Louise and Chloe were all playing ‘cards against humanity’, you and Harry were supposed to be playing as well but you had lost the mood to play. “What a punishment,” I said. Teddy looked questioningly at me. “To be in love with someone who doesn’t love you.” And then, again, I was thinking of Laurie.

blog.name: 20tomlinson02
blog.title: Gucci Suits & Tracksuits™
blog.description: Just a girl, that loves some guys, loving each other.

summary:
If Lou and Haz aren't together why are they:
Both in London
Both missing at the same time
Both growing their hair out (again)...
body:
If Lou and Haz aren’t together why are they:

  • Both in London
  • Both missing at the same time
  • Both growing their hair out (again) together
  • Not needing to tweet to communicate
  • Louis suddenly wearing a Japanese clothing brand in bulk after Harry’s visit to Japan, before both being in LA
  • And Harry only ever being online when the Xfactor Live Shows and Rehersals are on because Louis isn’t with him

Oh they’re all just coincidences ?

How odd.

title: Everything We Had
body:
Harry was there. Harry was always there, through everything. Until he wasn’t anymore. She was his best friend, she was the love of his life. She was also the girl he so stupidly let slip right out of his fingers.

Chapter Eleven

HarrySummer 2017 – LondonHarry held Elise until she cried herself to sleep, until the tears drained all the energy completely out of her, until her eyes fluttered shut and her breathing evened out….

Read more…

blog.name: multihoneybaby
blog.title: disaster lesbian
blog.description: Allison - 17                                                            One direction/Larry/Pete Davidson/Kate Mckinnon/Tv Shows/Etc.

summary: Do y’all ever have that moment of like ‘wow I can’t believe my idol exists’ because you are so grateful to them and you’re...
body: Do y’all ever have that moment of like ‘wow I can’t believe my idol exists’ because you are so grateful to them and you’re honestly not sure how you’d get on without them and their influence on you? How they practically shaped your personality, humour, and coping mechanisms? How seeing them passionate about what they’re doing and seeing them come out with new things (whether it be music, movies, merch, videos, posts, etc.) you can’t help but feel an overwhelming sense of pride because you know this person who means so much to you is actually doing what makes them happiest??? How on their bad days you understand them on a personal level and when they convey real emotions you feel like they’re directing them to you like they’re your friend and they chose you to confide in???? Anyways, I’m just so lucky to have had the opportunity to look up to the wonderful people I do, famous or not. What a time to be alive.
